Title: Citizens Advice Wigan Borough (Leigh office)
Description: Citizens Advice Wigan Borough provides free, independent, confidential,  impartial advice and information.  We can help with money problems, court forms, benefits, work, family matters and housing.   You can access our services in person, by telephone or via email, full details of how to contact us…
Location: Suite 2.1 Magnum House, 33 Lord Street, Leigh, WN7 1BY
